attributes.action: Make the Scottish Referandum Campaign a Live debate like the General Election
attributes.additional_details: For the Scottish Referandum coming up in two years time make it so that as with the General Election Campaign we have three Live debates so that the Fors and Against Independence can really go toe to toe and catch each other off guard therefore giving a the voters a clearer a picture as some things may be bought up that would not otherwise be bought up which could lead to regrets
